title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.6 - Requirements for approval of amendments, mergers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.6 - Requirements for approval of amendments, mergers

State Regulations

An application for the approval of the filing of a
certificate of amendment of a certificate of incorporation or of the filing of
a certificate of merger of a racing corporation pursuant to provisions of the

Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law shall be in such form, contain
such information and be executed in such manner as from time to time may be
prescribed by statute or by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
